document.full_text: an explosion hit a police station in nigeria's northeastern city of maiduguri just as presidential elections were beginning saturday, the second blast in the past 24 hours, residents said.
document.title: explosion hits police station in northeast nigeria
lines_and_colors: an explosion hit a police station in nigeria's northeastern city of maiduguri just as presidential elections were beginning saturday, the second blast in the past 24 hours, residents said.
